issue.title: [C++] Drop support for bundled Thrift < 0.13
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16721](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16721). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We bundle Thrift 0.16.0. Users can use other version but will not use 0.13 or earlier.
